solution_line_template: A quarter is worth five nickels because {value_of_quarter} / {value_of_nickel} = <<{value_of_quarter}/{value_of_nickel}={nickels_per_quarter}>>{nickels_per_quarter}
She gets {total_nickels} nickels from the bank because {num_quarters} x {nickels_per_quarter} = <<{num_quarters}*{nickels_per_quarter}={total_nickels}>>{total_nickels}
{num_iron_nickels} of the nickels are iron nickels because {total_nickels} x {iron_nickel_percent_decimal} = <<{total_nickels}*{iron_nickel_percent_decimal}={num_iron_nickels}>>{num_iron_nickels}
{num_regular_nickels} of the nickels are regular because {total_nickels} - {num_iron_nickels} = <<{total_nickels}-{num_iron_nickels}={num_regular_nickels}>>{num_regular_nickels}
The iron nickels are worth ${value_iron_nickels} because {num_iron_nickels} x {value_iron_nickel} = <<{num_iron_nickels}*{value_iron_nickel}={value_iron_nickels}>>{value_iron_nickels}
The regular nickels are worth ${value_regular_nickels} because {num_regular_nickels} x {value_of_nickel} = <<{num_regular_nickels}*{value_of_nickel}={value_regular_nickels}>>{value_regular_nickels}
Her money is now worth ${total_value} because {value_iron_nickels} + {value_regular_nickels} = <<{value_iron_nickels}+{value_regular_nickels}={total_value}>>{total_value}
